org.apache.paimon.data.columnar.heap

Class AbstractArrayBasedVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.data.columnar.writable.AbstractWritableVector
      • org.apache.paimon.data.columnar.heap.AbstractHeapVector
        • org.apache.paimon.data.columnar.heap.AbstractStructVector
          • org.apache.paimon.data.columnar.heap.AbstractArrayBasedVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ColumnVector, ElementCountable, WritableColumnVector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeapArrayVector, HeapMapVector

    public class AbstractArrayBasedVector
extends AbstractStructVector
    Abstract class for vectors that have offsets and lengths.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
